body.name: OTK 6 Tier Adjustable Bookshelf, Tall Bookcase, Office Shelf Storage Organizer, Modern Book Shelf for Living Room, Bedroom, and Home Office, Black
body.stockDetail: Only 8 left in stock - order soon.
features: ✅【6 TIER MULTIFUNCTIONAL SHELF】Outstanding sturdiness of this bookshelf. Each board can bear at least a 30lbs load. Multifunctional bookcase for you to place books, toy figures, photos, plants, etc. Amazing home and office furniture piece for your living room, study room, bedroom, and your office. Choose the OTK bookcase to keep your space organized and in style. Board size: 22.4"L x 11.8"W.

✅【ELEGANT MODERN STYLE CONSTRUCTED WITH STURDINESS】This bookcase is constructed by high-quality E1 particleboard and powder-coated metal frame. Guaranteed superior load-bearing, durability, and sturdiness. The shelves of this bookcase have textured surfaces, they are waterproof, anti-scratch, and very easy to clean.

✅【FIXED ROD ASSEMBLY and FALL PREVENTING KIT】With the fixed rod assembly on its back, the modern office shelf has a superior performance in terms of stability. With such a unique design, it will never shake or waggle like any other cheap shelf. Also, our fall preventing kit keeps you worry-free from a falling shelf.

✅【SUPER EASY TO INSTALL and EASY CLEANING】Detailed instruction and tools for installing are all included. It is very easy for you to install the simple bookshelf. You will never have hassle or difficulty in installing it. Please strictly follow the installation guide to avoid reinstallation.

✅【SMILEY CUSTOMER SERVICE】Welcome to Contact Us! Your satisfaction is our first priority – We got you anytime for any issue regarding our product quality or any problem during your purchase. Easy and fast response and replacement are guaranteed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great in the office
reviews.reviewText: Put this in my office, great shelf, very sturdy, easy assembly. Lots of shelf space. Love the look.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super easy to assemble, looks great!
reviews.reviewText: I ordered two of these shelves to go on either side of my tv. They arrived on time and had everything I needed in the box to assemble them. Each shelf took about 30 mins or so to put together by myself. They were easy to assemble, and I’d imagine it would be even easier if you had a partner helping like the instructions suggest. All holes lined up properly. One thing I will say is that you need to be careful not to over tighten the screws as the metal tubes do deform if you do. I had one screw pop through a screw hole because I screwed it in too tightly. Just watch the metal tube as you tighten. As soon as you see the metal start to indent, stop! I was able to whack it back out using a rubber mallet, so no real harm done. The shelves seem sturdy enough. They would probably be better if they had adjustable feet you could use to level them off. I did not use the anti-tip kit that was included because I don’t have any children or overly feisty pets to worry about. If you do, I would suggest using the kit just to be safe.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and Sturdy shelf
reviews.reviewText: Wow. That is all I can say. I love this shelf. It is so beautiful and easy to put together. Took me maybe 30 minutes to assemble because I put one side on wrong (my fault, I didn’t see the hole in the back that needed to line up with the other side). I have a candle museum as my husband calls it, 86 to be exact and it doesn’t even budge under that weight. I would highly recommend this to anyone who needs it for whatever. It will add a beautiful touch to any room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for the price
reviews.reviewText: This bookshelf is a bit small but it looks very nice. We have it filled with heavy books and there are no issues with leaning etc. The material itself doesn’t seem particularly sturdy, but we haven’t had any issues. I recommend it.

reviews.reviewText: I used it to organize game consoles. The quality is very good. Instructions were also clear. Size specifications are correct. Sturdy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks great but must be a rocket scientist to assemble!
reviews.reviewText: I have my MBA and it took me 15 hours to put two of these together. The look great but...soooooo complex to put together. So if you like puzzels go forth and purchase but if your looking for ease of assembly...forget it.
